page.title: Tools
page.introduction: The Tools menu bar provides tools that can be used to assist with model development and analysis in VCell.

list.item: Launch Virtual FRAP - opens VirtualFRAP, a tool to analyze fluorescence photobleaching experiments using VCell spatial modeling technology.
Start ImageJ Service - allows the VCell client to accept commands from an ImageJ plugin. An ImageJ plugin to use VCell from ImageJ is currently under development.
Transform to Stochastic Capable - launches a tool to convert a deterministic model to a stochastic-capable model, where possible.
